phrases: You can ask me about anything you would like.
I will do whatever I can to help.
This is the broom you are provided with by the school.
This is the broom you are provided with by the schooloh?!
The school has provided you with this broom.
Professor, can I write my name on my new broom?
I am about to have my first lesson on flight magic!
I can learn to ride a broom at last!
My longtime dream is coming true!
The new students are having a special lesson.
Everyone else is to practice high speed flight.
Flight magic is the most basic essential in a witch's repertoire.
Then pay your respects to the broom.
Imagine yourself flying, cast the spell, and kick off the ground!
When will you get that through your thick skull?!
Well if it is not Akko!
Are you still unable to ride a broom?
You will be able to fly with practice.
This race is an old tradition where teams of three have to fly a baton all the way to the goal.
Awesome, I want to win too!
Were not you the one who just told me I would be able to fly with practice?
Y-Yeah... but there will not be enough time between now and the broom relay.
Y-Yeah... but there is not enough time until the broom relay.
Anyway, I need to stop by the magic item cafe to pick up the broom I had repaired.
We would already be there if we took a broom.
You cannot really use that much magic here in the village where the Sorcerer's Stone's power is weak.
Hey, what kind of place is the magic item cafe?
They service various magic items, and even serve tea while you wait.
It is the broom of disaster.
I bet even I could fly if I rode it, and I know I will be able to win the broom relay too!
Besides, this year's cup is totally going to li'l Diana!
The favorite to win and number one in popularity is by and far Diana.
You sure love to clean, do not you...?
I know how much you love to clean.
We have no shot at victory as long as you cannot fly a broom.
We have no chance at victory if you cannot fly a broom.
People like you learn these things best if they dive into them head to toe.
I will simply be flying as per usual.
It will be an easy win without any competition.
Leading the pack is Miss Glasses, our plain and average everygirl Lotte Jansson!
Leading the pack is The Everygirl, Miss Glasses,
I am Amanda, a rebel just like you.
Who cares as long as I win?
She is frog hopping on her broom!
Withdraw and call the medic squad.
I will not even let go at the very depths of hell!
I will not let go to the very depths of hell!
I was certainly surprised that Kagari took second, despite her inability to fly.
Right, I came to tell you I was appointed as your mentor.
Feel free to ask me about anything you would like.
I will be glad to help you.
This is the broom the school has provided you.
It is Shiny Chariot's magic staff.
Professor, do you know about Chariot?
She told me I need to turn in any lost property I find.
But I am sure that holding on to this will eventually lead me to Chariot.
I promise I will give it back once I find her!
You are the one it revealed itself to, which makes you its rightful owner.
Fate and magic will surely guide you.
Professor, can I put my name on my new broom?
Now I will finally be able to fly!
A believing heart is my magic!
A believing heart is my magic, huh.
Here where our long journey has finally led us
Here where our long journey has finally led us
kakedashita hibi ni yukitsuita kono basho
kakedashita hibi ni yukitsuita kono basho
We can push open the door
We can push open the door
In the footsteps of our dreams far beyond the stars
In the footsteps of our dreams far beyond the stars
hoshizora no kanata yume no ashiato
hoshizora no kanata yume no ashiato
Pick up the pieces with a song
Pick up the pieces with a song
Keep the destination of your dreams nestled in your heart
Keep the destination of your dreams nestled in your heart
yume ga kaketeku basho i am about to mo kokoro ni himete
yume ga kaketeku basho i am about to mo kokoro ni himete
The landscape looks like it is burning brilliantly
The landscape looks like it is burning brilliantly
yaketsuita you ni irodzuita fuukei wa
yaketsuita you ni irodzuita fuukei wa
But you cannot see it fallen on the ground
But you cannot see it fallen on the ground
The world will keep on turning
The world will keep on turning
Embrace the moment as if it will never come again
Embrace the moment as if it will never come again
hakanai mama no i am about to wo dakishimete
hakanai mama no i am about to wo dakishimete
Let us keep walking as we are with the light in our sights
Let us keep walking as we are with the light in our sights
kawaranai mama jikan to hikari mitsumete aruiteku
kawaranai mama jikan to hikari mitsumete aruiteku
My first flight magic lesson is about to start!
I will get to learn how to ride a broom at long last!
Lookie, how do you think I got this scar?
I fell out of a tree trying to fly when I was little.
This one is from when I rolled all the way down a hill.
And I got this one falling off a roof.
Nobody can fly outside the range of the Sorcerer's Stone.
The only reason we can use magic freely on campus is because the Sorcerer's Stone is here.
You cannot blame little me for not knowing.
How could I have guessed that magic energy comes from the Sorcerer's Stone?
I just believed I could fly and practiced my heart out!
And now I can fly for real!
My childhood dream is coming true!
I-I get it, just calm down.
I will be instructing the class on flight magic.
The new students are having a special lesson.
Everyone else is to practice high-speed flight.
Flight magic is the most basic of essentials in a witch's repertoire.
But take it lightly and you will injure yourself, so be careful.
Then, pay your respects to the broom.
Imagine yourself taking to the sky, cast the spell, and kick off the ground!
Funnel your magic into the broom!
You would have no problem winning a shouting match.
I have never seen anyone with your lack of skill before.
Get that through your thick skull already!
Wow, way to kill my fun.
That is a new record, Diana!
Diana's the clear favorite to win this year's broom relay.
Well, if it is not Akko!
You are still unable to ride a broom?
I know just the thing for you.
You will be able to fly if you keep practicing.
And here I had confidence in my athletic ability.
Oh, they must be practicing their baton passes for the broom relay coming up.
The Luna Nova Cup broom relay.
It is a long-standing tradition where teams of three race to carry a baton all the way to the goal.
Chariot entered too, and she won!
Awesome, I want to do it too!
I am going to win and get my picture put next to Chariot's!
Were not you the one who just told me I would be able to fly if I keep practicing?
Y-Yeah... but there is barely any time between now and the broom relay.
Is not Chariot just the coolest?
Anyway, I need to stop by the magic item cafe to pick up the broom I had them repair.
We would already be there if we would taken a broom.
The Sorcerer's Stone's power is weak out here in the village, so we cannot use all that much magic.
Hey, what kind of place is the magic item cafe?
They service various magic items, and you are even served tea while you wait.
I am here to pick up my broom.
Let us see... right, this one.
Not quite what I was imagining.
It is the legendary broom, Shooting Star!
They say a witch was able to cross the entire Atlantic Ocean on it.
It can fly even without power from the Sorcerer's Stone.
The legendary broom itself is filled with magic.
It truly resembles a shooting star streaking across the sky.
It is a dangerous broom that will fly to the ends of the Earth with no reservations about flinging witches off.
But as long as it is got this thing on, we can cage it even if it escapes.
If it ever gets out though, the boss will seriously chew me out.
There are rumors of it outflying a jet plane.
I bet even I could fly if I rode it, and I know I will be able to win the broom relay too!
No way, there is nobody out there who can tame this wild broom.
Besides, the cup's totally going to li'l Diana this year!
Diana is the runaway favorite to win and also the number one in popularity.
Every single one of them is Diana this, Diana that.
I am a contender to win too!
As soon as I learn to fly...
It seems you cannot ride your broom yet.
I thought this could give you a few tips.
This is an elementary school-level textbook, but it explains the fundamentals of broom riding
I bet I can fly with this!
Use your broom to clean on a daily basis in order to improve your communication with it.
Let the broom know that you are its rider.
You sure love to clean, do not you?
Do you know what will happen if you do not fly?
I am begging you to fly!
It was just a hunch before, but now I am sure Akko's a moron.
If we do not do something, there is no way we will win!
I could not care less about competing.
I already put in our application.
Guess we will just lose by default.
We are going to win and have them put our picture up next to Chariot's!
It says the winning team gets a trophy as well as a prize from Professor Luki.
She is also known as a professor of the occult.
Huh, I wonder what the prize is.
Something I am sure to find very useful.
We have no shot at victory if you cannot even ride a broom.
People like you need to learn these things with your body.
You should be about ready to fly now.
Let us see the results of your training!
Yeah, I think I can feel it!
Guess I will come up with something else.
I now call to open the broom relay of the 1333rd Luna Nova Cup.
To the victors, fame and honor.
They will also receive a prize from Professor Luki.
How are you doing, fans of the broom relay across the world?
Live coverage of this event is brought to you by the Luna Nova News Network!
It looks like all the competitors are on the scene and raring to go!
Here we have the dark horse, Amanda O'Neill.
Well, I am planning to just enjoy it.
It is the favorite to win, Diana!
I will simply be flying as usual.
The broom relay will take place along the Luna Nova special course.
Make certain to charge your brooms with energy from the Sorcerer's Stone!
First leg flyers, confirm your hold of the baton!
Any damage, loss, or poor handoffs of the baton during the race will result in disqualification.
First leg flyers, head to the start line!
Second leg and anchor flyers, go to your relay points!
Shall I outfit your training wheels again?
We will be the ones to win.
Sucy, you sound confident, but I am not that fast a flyer.
Just fly like you always do, Lotte.
I just gave your brooms a bit of nourishment.
With no competition, we can just coast to victory.
We are off to an unexpected start!
Leading the pack is Miss Glasses,
our average, ordinary everygirl, Lotte Jansson!
A name that would make any announcer cry!
Constanze overtook her before the relay point!
Coming out on top is the Speed of Sound Tinker Techie, Constanze!
No wonder the nutrients had no effect.
And holding on to the top spot is The Magic World's Food Fighter, Jasminka Antonenko!
Oh no, what has overcome her?!
I am Amanda, a rebel cut from the same tree as you.
There are not no broom in the world I cannot ride!
In the lead by a mile is the Mushroom Poison Queen, Sucy!
What is the meaning of that uncouth riding style?
Who cares, as long as I win?
Could this be a breach of conduct?
She is frog-hopping on her broom!
Can the ribbiting Akko-tan make it all the way?!
The rest of the contestants who were held up at the start line take off at top speed!
I will never let you go!
Consider my debt paid with this.
Withdraw and call the rescue squad.
It is impossible for you to continue.
What is an injury or two or three or four or five or six?!
If I say I will ride a broom, then I am going to ride it!
Do not even try to shake me off now.
I will not even let go to the very depths of hell!
In first place is the Trustworthy and Talented Cool Beauty, Diana!
Will she pull away until the end?!
She probably gave up somewhere along the way.
It is Akko flying on her broom!
Bringing up third is The Wild Dark Horse Tomboy, Amanda!
In fact, that is not a baton but a donut!
It is Diana and Akko, neck and neck!
Looks more like she chained herself to it.
They have rounded the final bend!
I was certainly surprised that Miss Kagari took second, despite her inability to fly.
It seems she has passion, if nothing else.
I lost sight of everything else
I lost sight of everything else
